contents:
首先先了解一下印度的情况，
墙内媒体少有报道，对国外疫情热度都集中在黑日本上呢ORZ。
https://www.google.com/amp/s/m.economictimes.com/news/international/world-news/coronavirus-in-india-what-is-happening-and-what-you-should-know/amp_articleshow/73978271.cms
这是今天刚发布的文章，
标题为：
Coronavirus in India: What is

 happening and what you should

 know

印度的新冠发展：发生了什么，以及你需要知道什么




其中部分有用内容如下：
All three cases of the infection 

in India, reported from Kerala, 

have now been tested negative 

- two of which have now been 

discharged from hospital.

在kerala（印度某邦），一共有三例确诊，都已经被检测为阴性，其中两名已经出院。


A total of 2,242 people are 

under observation across Kerala, 

out of which, eight are in 

isolation wards of various 

hospitals and other under home 

quarantine.


在kerala，一共2242人在被观察，其中8名处于各个医院的隔离病房中，其他人在家隔离


In Maharashtra, five travellers

 have been admitted in hospital 

over suspicion of being infected

 by the novel coronavirus. A 

total of 39,784 travellers have

 been screened at the Mumbai 

international airport since 

around mid-January for 

coronavirus

在Maharashtra（印度某邦），5名游客因疑似感染而住院。自1月中旬以来，孟买机场已经对共39784名游客进行冠状病毒感染筛查。


Meanwhile, another Indian abroad 

the quarantined ship off Japanese

 coast has tested positive for 

the novel coronavirus and shifted 

to hospital, taking the number

 of Indian nationals infected 

with the virus on the vessel

 to seven.

钻石公主号已经有7名确诊的印度人。


印度取消对中国签证的延期（原文过长，不再截取）


As of February 10, 1818 flights

 and 1,97,192 passengers were 

screened so far at 21 Airports

. 9,452 persons are presently

 under community surveillance 

in 32 states and UTs. 1,510 

samples have been tested and 

1,507 of them were found 

negative except for 3 samples 

which had tested positive 

already from Kerala

截至2月10日，1818个航班和197192名乘客在21个机场接受了检查。目前有9452人在32个州和UTS接受社区监督。已检测了1510个样本，其中1507个样本为阴性，但有3个样本已从kerala邦检测出阳性。

以及下面的
“What's new in Kerala?”
“What is Centre doing?”
“Any Indians left in Wuhan?”
“Are airlines still flying to China?”
等内容。
起码数据比较精确与透明，
我们可以看到他们从出入境到药物，都实行了及时的管控措施，

除钻石公主号以外，印度本土有三名确诊，两名已出院，
对于疑似病例及接触者的管控也一一列出。
至于为什么没有爆发，以及未来是否有可能爆发，

目前没有爆发是因为尼三哥的确没有抄错题，管控及时，数据公开。其中也可能有一部分原因是，中国游客以及中国逃客，选择去印度的可能性相较于其他国家实在是小，中国入境人士还是以商业往来为多。

至于是否爆发，未来的确有可能爆发，基于印度庞大的人口，以及卫生，医疗设施等。
